issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add support for concat
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9892](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9892). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
So that we can concatenate strings together.

`pub fn concat(args: Vec<Expr>) -> Expr`
